scripts.build: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:backend && pnpm build:client
scripts.build:local: pnpm build:shared && pnpm build:backend && pnpm build:client:local
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter @president-challenge/shared run lint:fix && pnpm --filter @president-challenge/server run lint:fix && pnpm --filter @president-challenge/client run lint:fix
scripts.lint:check: pnpm --filter @president-challenge/shared run lint:fix && pnpm --filter @president-challenge/server run lint:check && pnpm --filter @president-challenge/client run lint:check
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @president-challenge/shared run lint:fix && pnpm --filter @president-challenge/server run typecheck && pnpm --filter @president-challenge/client run typecheck
